title: customer_growth
description:
📈 Summary: You mostly have new customers each month.

🔍 Key Observations:
- New customers make up the majority every month compared to returning ones.
- There's a consistent small number of returning customers.
- The highest total number of customers appears steady across the year.

✅ Tip for Action: Consider a loyalty program to encourage more returning visits.

title: hourly_order
description:
📈 Summary: Orders are highest early in the morning and in the late afternoon.

🔍 Key Observations:
- The most orders happen around 6 AM and again at 6 PM.
- There's a noticeable drop in orders between 7 AM and 10 AM, with the lowest point at 10 AM.
- Orders pick up again in the afternoon, peaking at 6 PM.

✅ Tip for Action: Consider offering morning specials and evening deals to take advantage of the rush during those hours.

title: multi_day_hourly
description:
📈 Summary: Salad sales increased in April.

🔍 Key Observations: 
- Salad sales were highest in April compared to other sandwiches.
- The Tuna sandwich had the lowest sales in March.
- All items saw a slight sales rise in May. 

✅ Tip for Action: Consider promoting the Tuna sandwich to boost its popularity.

title: monthly_income
description:
📈 Summary: Income had ups and downs over the months.

🔍 Key Observations:
- Income was highest in May.
- It dropped sharply in June.
- There were smaller ups and downs in other months.

✅ Tip for Action: Try to find out why May was so successful and see if you can repeat that in other months.

title: food_breakdown
current_data: [{"item_name": "4-Piece Chicken Meal", "monthly_quantity": 15918}, {"item_name": "Chicken & Waffles", "monthly_quantity": 8552}, {"item_name": "Spicy Chicken Tenders", "monthly_quantity": 4759}, {"item_name": "Potato Wedges", "monthly_quantity": 16702}]
description:
📈 Summary: Fried chicken sales stayed mostly steady, while certain side dishes had big changes.

🔍 Key Observations:
- For fried chicken, the highest sales were in May, and they remained strong throughout the year.
- Chicken & Waffles and Spicy Chicken Tenders had a slight dip around June.
- The 4-Piece Chicken Meal peaked sharply in May for sides.

✅ Tip for Action: Consider focusing promotions on the 4-Piece Chicken Meal around May to maximize sales during peak interest.
